tool_description: Authenticates and validates submitted documents such as identification, certifications, and proof of address against known standards and requirements.

document_type.description: Type of document to verify (drivers_license, passport, certification, proof_of_address, resume)

issuing_authority.description: Organization or agency that issued the document

applicant_name.description: Name on the document being verified

error_messages: Invalid document type: Use one of [drivers_license, passport, certification, proof_of_address, resume]
Document number format invalid: Provide a valid document identifier
Expired document: Document has passed its expiration date
Name mismatch: Name on document does not match applicant information
Unrecognized issuing authority: Provide a valid issuing organization
usage: Submit document details including type, number, and issuing authority to verify authenticity and validity for volunteer screening.

verification_score.description: Confidence score from 0-100 for document authenticity

issues_found.description: List of problems or discrepancies identified
